Name: Osylla
About the game: History Marzia and Sophies mother, Lily, is going through a tough time. She beging drinking too much alcohol, making her violent with her own daughters. Marzia, the eldest, wants to help her by taking to a doctor and enrolling in a group for alcoholics, but she refuses. Now they are in great danger and need to help her as soon as possible. Playability - Single Player . - Immersive experience , you don't have to worry about the interface, we want to make it as simple as possible so you can have a fully immersive experience. - Collect the items in order to help your sister escape and help your mother as well. - Procedural items on the map.
